texts.Feature:TwoFactorDescription: Disabled: No one can set two-factor, Required: All users must set two-factor, Optional: Users can set two-factor if they wish.
texts.DisplayName:Abp.Identity.UsersCanChange: Allow users to change their Two Factor.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.UsersCanChange: Allow users to change their Two Factor.
texts.Feature:MaximumUserCountDescription: Limits the number of users in the public registration and admin user creation screens. For unlimited users enter 0.
texts.Volo.Abp.Identity:010015: Reached maximum allowed user count! This tenant is allowed to have a maximum of {MaxUserCount} users.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.PreventConcurre: Allow users to log in simultaneously from any platform or restrict them from having multiple sessions across different clients.
texts.Description:IdentityProPreventConcurrent: Users can stay logged in across multiple platforms.
Users can keep their sessions active only on different platforms. Only the most recent session is allowed on the same platform. For example, users cannot have 2 different web browser sessions.
The system denies concurrent logins; therefore, users can only have 1 active session, which is the most recent one.
texts.ClaimValueCanNotBeBlank: Claim value can not be blank!
texts.ThereIsNoUsersCurrentlyInThisRole: There is no users currently in this role.
texts.ThereIsNoUsersCurrentlyInThisOrganizatio: There is no users currently in this organization unit.
texts.YouCanNotEnableTwoFactorForThisUser: You can not enable two factor for this user because the user does not configured any two factor providers.
